title: Agent container readiness check via tmux capture-pane

comment: CR-064 REVIEW -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval. FRONTMATTER: title: Agent container readiness check via tmux capture-pane -- present, non-empty. revision_summary: Address QA review deficiencies -- present, descriptive. CR ID not required for self-authorizing executable document per SOP-002 Section 8. REQUIRED SECTIONS (SOP-002 Section 6): All 12 sections present (Purpose, Scope, Current State, Proposed State, Change Description, Justification, Impact Assessment, Testing Summary, Implementation Plan, Execution, Execution Summary, References). PREVIOUSLY NOTED DEFICIENCIES: (1) Missing EXECUTION PHASE INSTRUCTIONS in Section 10 -- RESOLVED. Full comment block now present. (2) Section 2.3 inconsistency with Sections 5.2 and 7.1 regarding hub.py -- RESOLVED. Section 2.3 now lists only container.py; Section 5.2 states No changes needed to hub.py; Section 7.1 lists hub.py as No change. All consistent. PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found. Execution-phase placeholders conforming for pre-approval. ENCODING: No raw non-ASCII characters. U+276F referenced by code point in text and Python escape in code. Em dashes replaced with double hyphens. TECHNICAL CONTENT: Sound. Async polling with 2s intervals and 60s timeout. Error handling leaves container running for inspection. FORMATTING: Sequential numbering 1-12, consistent subsections, proper tables, code blocks, horizontal rules, END OF DOCUMENT marker. TRACEABILITY: SOP-001, SOP-002 (both EFFECTIVE). Origin: Session 2026-02-08-001. TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.

CR-064 POST-EXECUTION REVIEW -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval. EI TABLE: Both EI-1 and EI-2 have all four editable fields populated (Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By, Date). Both outcomes are Pass. No VARs required. EI-1 EVIDENCE: Cites specific line numbers (method at lines 244-275, call site at line 67), describes implementation details (tmux capture-pane polling for U+276F, 60s timeout, 2s interval), and error behavior (RuntimeError, ERROR state, container left alive). Adequate and verifiable. EI-2 EVIDENCE: Describes end-to-end integration test -- Hub restarted, QA policy set to auto_on_task, test CR-066 created and routed, Hub auto-launched QA container, three verification points confirmed via tmux capture-pane (prompt appeared, notification injected and submitted, QA began orchestrating). Test vehicle CR-066 canceled after verification. Adequate with observable verification points. EXECUTION COMMENTS: One comment present explaining test CR-066 as test vehicle and its disposal. EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Complete. Summarizes both EIs passed, timing bug resolved, no deviations. SECTIONS 1-9 INTEGRITY: Compared draft against v1.0 pre-approved baseline. All nine sections identical -- no pre-approved content modified during execution. ADDITIONAL: Frontmatter unchanged. No remaining placeholders. No non-ASCII characters. Formatting consistent. END OF DOCUMENT marker present.
